also, i
>greatly prefer the speed of the 1hs weapons.. they do less damage, but if
>they swing almost twice as fast you are ultimately getting more out of it
;)

This is one of those real circumstantial things that make it so good to keep
both 1h and 2h up. If you're fighting spellcasting mobs, its all about
quick hits to increase the chance of an interrupt. If, on the other hand,
you're fighting in some place like Lavastorm where there's alot of mobs with
damage shields, speed kills. Personally, I prefer to have the best of both
worlds and be able to use whatever weapon the particular situation calls
for. Also, I know for a fact that there's a mix of 1h and 2h holy swords,
and from what I can tell, paladins and sk's parallel *very* closely. I
would be very unsurpriesed if there are both 1h and 2h flavors of unholy
swords, so I figure, might as well keep both skills up. =)
